name: xarf-bundler
description: Created bundled and fully derefed versions of xarf schema
author: Frederik Petersen <fp@abusix.com>

scripts.generate-code: ajv compile -c ajv-formats -s xarf.schema.json -r 'schemas/**/*.schema.json' -o gen_validate_schema.js && js-beautify gen_validate_schema.js > gen_validate_schema_pretty.js
scripts.test-xarf: yarn clean-coverage && yarn generate-code && nyc --reporter=lcov mocha test/test_xarf.js
